flavorText: It wasn't long before the taverns of High and Dry were full of whispers about the new captain who could turn a person to stone with a glance.

foreignData.flavorText: Schon bald kursierten im Hafen am Ende der Welt die wildesten Gerüchte über die neue Kapitänin, die jemanden mit nur einem Blick zu Stein erstarren lassen konnte.
foreignData.name: Vraskas Verachtung
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl ins Exil. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: No pasó mucho tiempo hasta que las tabernas de Zabordada se llenaron de rumores sobre la nueva capitana que podía convertir a alguien en piedra con una sola mirada.
foreignData.name: Desprecio de Vraska
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo. Ganas 2 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Les tavernes de La Rade se firent bientôt l'écho de la rumeur d'une nouvelle capitaine capable de transformer quelqu'un en pierre d'un simple regard.
foreignData.name: Mépris de Vraska
foreignData.text: Exilez la créature ciblée ou le planeswalker ciblé. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Ben presto, nelle taverne della Secca si cominciò a mormorare della nuova capitana in grado di trasformare la gente in pietra con un solo sguardo.
foreignData.name: Disprezzo di Vraska
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio. Guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 一睨みで人を石に変える新船長の話題が、孤高街のどの酒場でも囁かれるようになるまで、長くはかからなかった。
foreignData.name: ヴラスカの侮辱
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。あなたは２点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 얼마 지나지 않아 하이 앤 드라이의 선술집들은 쳐다보는 것만으로 사람을 돌로 만든다는 신임 선장에 대한 소문으로 들끓었다.
foreignData.name: 브라스카의 경멸
foreignData.text: 생물이나 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한다. 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Não levou muito tempo para que as tavernas de Banco de Areia se enchessem de murmúrios sobre a nova capitã capaz de transformar as pessoas em pedra com um olhar.
foreignData.name: Desprezo de Vraska
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Прошло совсем немного времени, и в тавернах Города-на-Мели шепотом заговорили о новом капитане, способном одним взглядом обратить в камень.
foreignData.name: Презрение Враски
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевое существо или planeswalker-а. Вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: 绝涛城的酒馆里很快就传开了这样的流言：有位新船长只消一瞪眼就能将人变成石头。
foreignData.name: 瓦丝卡的藐视
foreignData.text: 放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。你获得2点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 絕濤城的酒館裡很快就傳開了這樣的流言：有位新船長只消一瞪眼就能將人變成石頭。
foreignData.name: 瓦絲卡的藐視
foreignData.text: 放逐目標生物或鵬洛客。你獲得2點生命。

name: Vraska's Contempt
originalText: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature or planeswalker is an illegal target by the time Vraska’s Contempt resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain life.

There are many important moments in the story, but the most crucial—called “story spotlights”—are shown on cards. These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.
